description: Move students on the character card to any isle you wish!
Snag an opponent's professor if you have the same number of their students!
Calculate the influence on any Island and reap the rewards!
You may move Mother Nature up to 2 additional spaces!
Place a No Entry card on an isle and block Mother Nature's power once!
If somebody tries to Conquer an island, ignore the towers for this turn!
Swap 3 of the students on this card with 3 from your Entrance!
Add 2 to your Influence this turn!
Choose a student color to ignore when calculating Influence this turn!
Switch up to two students between your Entrance and your Dining Room!
Take one student from this card and put them in the dining room, then draw another from the bag and replace them!
Choose a color: EVERYONE must return 3 students of that color to the bag!
